## vEM capabilities

- HPF at EMBL, SZN, UEXE and UHEI
- Leica Ultracut for AT
- 2 Zeiss Gemini SEMs at COS, FIB-SEM at EMBL, 1 Zeiss Gemini SEM in Exeter
- resolution from 8-2 nm XY (synaptic) or lower
- 30-70 nm sections (8 nm in FIB-SEM)
- a 200 μm long larva takes ~5,000 sections
- 100-500 sections collected as ribbons on a slide (AT)
- imaging time from days to months

## Data analysis challenges

- potentially large (Tbyte) datasets
- alignment of thousands of sections a challenge
- collaborative annotation (CATMAID)
- segmentation vs. skeletonisation
- data sharing
- etc...
